channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- ABB CP400 Panel Builder TextEditor 2.0
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- ABB CP400 Panel Builder TextEditor 2.0

item.title: CVE-2018-19008|2024-09-17T03:52:53.725Z -- ics-cert -- abb%20cp400%20panel%20builder%20texteditor%202.0
item.description: The TextEditor 2.0 in ABB CP400 Panel Builder versions 2.0.7.05 and earlier contain a vulnerability in the file parser of the Text Editor wherein the application doesn't properly prevent the insertion of specially crafted files which could allow arbitrary code execution.
